desc.en: Guangdong Intercity is an intercity railway system serving Guangdong Province, China, and its first line opened on March 30, 2016.As of May 2024, there are 4 intercity railway lines in operation in Guangdong, with an operating mileage of 273.69 kilometers and a total of 38 stations, which have now connected 6 cities including Guangzhou, Foshan, Dongguan, Huizhou, Zhaoqing and Qingyuan.By the end of 2022, the cumulative number of passengers sent by Guangdong's intercity railways was 4,015,400, with an average daily volume of 5,151 passengers.
desc.zh-Hans: 广东城际铁路是服务于中国广东省的城际铁路系统，其第一条线路于2016年3月30日开通。截至2024年5月，广东城际铁路运营线路共有4条，运营里程为273.69千米，共设38座车站 ，现已连接广州、佛山、东莞、惠州、肇庆、清远等6个城市。截至2022年底，广东城际铁路旅客累计发送量401.54万人次，日均发送量5151人次。

updateHistory.reason: Fix the wrong English name of Sanshuibei Station
